wordGroup: groundwater level 地下水位；地下水面；潜水面
groundwater flow 地下水，地下水径流

sentences.en: A groundwater reservoir from which water can be extracted is called an aquifer.
sentences.cn: 可以从中抽取水的地下蓄水层被称为含水层。

sentences.en: Wetlands have a big effect on groundwater, the amount of water below the surface of the land.
sentences.cn: 湿地对地下水，即地表以下的水量影响很大。

sentences.en: Research from the exhaustive study of groundwater from over 950 drilling logs has just been published.
sentences.cn: 对950多篇钻井日志中涉及地下水问题的详尽研究刚刚发表。
